Series tiểu thuyết Harry Potter

Giới thiệu ngoại truyện Harry Potter

“Hidden||Harry Potter various [YEAR 1-2]” là phiên bản ngoại truyện nổi tiếng trong cộng đồng yêu thích sáng tạo fanfiction trên nền tảng Wattpad của tác giả Jihye_1a. Trong ngoại truyện này, độc giả sẽ được nhập vai vào một nhân vật hoàn toàn mới.

Cô bé được gửi tới trường Hogwarts vào một đêm trời nổi cơn bão tố. Quê hương của cô bé hiện đang chìm trong biển lửa chiến tranh và gia đình cô bé không biết làm gì hơn là gửi cô đến Hogwarts, mong nơi đây có thể bảo vệ cho cô khôn lớn. Với tình thương vô bờ của mình, cụ Dumbledore – Hiệu trưởng trường Hogwarts – đã nhận nuôi cô bé và giúp cô sống một cuộc đời mới với cái tên Danny Dumbledore.

Các bạn có thể tìm xem bản do tác giả Jihye_1a viết trên Wattpad tại đây. Bây giờ, chúng ta hãy đến ngay với phần chính, cùng học tiếng Anh với phần đầu tiên của câu chuyện – Hồi 1: Nhân vật bí ẩn.

Học tiếng anh cùng Hồi 1: Nhân vật bí ẩn

Hôm đó là một ngày đặc biệt, Danny đã chính thức được nhận lá thư nhập học trường Hogwarts từ ông mình - Thầy hiệu trưởng Dumbledore. Ngay sau đó, cô được giao nhiệm vụ đồng hành cùng bác Hagrid, cả hai sẽ lên đường để đón "cậu bé được chọn" Harry Potter. Vậy hành trình của cô bé Danny sẽ diễn ra như thế nào? Đọc lại Ngoại truyện Harry Potter – Hồi 1: Nhân vật bí ẩn

I woke up as soon as1 the sun hit my face. I groaned and sat down to my bed, “I want to sleep more.” I slammed my body back to my bed, “Danny goes wash up now, and goes to the great hall quick.” I heard aunt Hooch spoke2, I looked3 towards the door, and she was leaning4 against the doorway.

“Alright, alright.” I stood up and went to the bathroom and did my daily routine, “Why the rush.” I brushed my teeth as5 more questions come to my mind, thinking6 what the next prank we’ll be doing today with the twins.

After I’m done with my routine in the bathroom, I changed my nightclothes into a grey dress and headed to the great hall. But I was surprised7 by the loud noises of party popper and clapping hands, and I looked at everyone confused.

“Grandpapa, what’s going on?” I walked up to my grandfather and stood next to uncle Snape, “Here.” Grandfather gave me a letter8, I looked at him in confusion but then it struck me, I hurried looked at the letter, and it was my Hogwarts letter.

“No…” I mumbled as I opened the letter, there were two papers. The first one says

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

Headmaster: Albus Dumbledore

(Order of Merlin, First Class, Grand Sorc., Chf. Warlock, Supreme Mugwump, International Confed. of Wizards)

Dear Ms. Dumbledore,

We are pleased to inform you that9 you have been accepted10 at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Please find enclosed a list of all necessary books and equipment.

The term begins on 1 September. We await your owl by no later than 31 July.

Yours sincerely,

Minerva McGonagall

Deputy Headmistress

Then I looked at the other paper, and it says all the things I’ll be needing11 as the first year.

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

UNIFORM

First-year students will require12:

1. Three sets of plain work robes (black)

2. One plain pointed hat (black) for day wear

3. One pair of protective gloves (dragon hide or similar)

4. One winter cloak (black, with silver fastenings)

Please note that all pupil’s clothes should carry name tags.

COURSE BOOKS

All students should have13 a copy of each of the following:

The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1) by Miranda Goshawk

A History of Magic by Bathilda Bagshot

Magical Theory by Adalbert Waffling

A Beginner’s Guide to Transfiguration by Emeric Switch

One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi by Phyllida Spore

Magical Drafts and Potions by Arsenius Jiager

Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them by Newt Scamander

The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self-Protection by Quentin Trimble

OTHER EQUIPMENT

1 wand

1 cauldron (pewter, standard size 2)

1 set glass or crystal phials

1 telescope

1 set brass scales

Students may also bring if they desire an owl OR a cat OR a toad.

PARENTS ARE REMINDED THAT FIRST YEARS ARE NOT ALLOWED THEIR OWN BROOMSTICK

Yours sincerely,

Lucinda Thomsonicle-Pocus

Chief Attendant of Witchcraft Provisions

I stared at them with widened eyes, and then to all students. They all smiled at me.

“I, I got my letter.” I started crying, as all the staff congratulated me and gave me a warm hug.

I ran to my friends as they all hugged me. I ran to the twins and showed them my letter.

“Congratulations, Danny!” Fred hugged me.

“I hope you get in Gryffindor.” George pinched my cheeks.

“It doesn’t matter which house you go to Danny, but I hope you do go to Gryffindor,” Percy said as Oliver nodded and smiled at me.

“He’s right, we do hope you get in Gryffindor, but for me, it doesn’t matter.” Oliver ruffled my hair.

“Thanks!” I grinned at them.



“Danny.” My grandfather called out for me; I excused myself from my Hufflepuff friends and went to him.

“What is it, grandpapa?” I smiled, “I wish you to go with Hagrid14 to fetch someone.” He said.

“Oh, that okay. But when grandpapa?” I asked one more time. “Now.” Uncle Hagrid came out of nowhere.

“Now? Isn’t it a bit late?” “We’ll have to fetch this kid; I’m sure you’ll have fun.”

“Alright, then.” I shrug.



Both uncle Hagrid and I went to the muggle world; it was fascinating.

“We’re here.” The house was in a rock in the ocean. I have no idea why we are here, but I’m sure it will be fun.

Uncle Hagrid kicked the door down and left a big dud as thunder came. People were people screamed in fear.

“Sorry ‘bout that.” Uncle Hagrid said as he fixed the door back where it belongs.

“I demand that you leave at once, Sir! You’re breaking and entering!” The old fat man said as he held a gun towards us.



² Harry’s POV ²

There are a giant man and a little girl who seems15 a similar age to me. But she’s a bit small.

The giant man walked towards uncle Vernon and grabs the gun and bends it upwards.

“Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.” He said as the gun fires.

“Ah!!” Aunt Petunia and Dudley gasp, as the little girl covered her ears.

“Uncle, that wasn’t nice!” She still covering her ears from the shot.

“Sorry about that, Danny.” He chuckled. But then he spotted Dudley and walked a bit closer to him.

“Mind, I haven’t seen you since you were a baby, Harry, but you’re a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly ‘round the middle.” He rubs his stomach.

“I-I’m not Harry,” Dudley said in fear.

“Hahaha! Silly uncle! He’s over there.” The little girl giggled and pointed at me.

“Where?”

“I-l am.” I moved from my hiding place.

“Oh, well, of course, you are! Got something for you, Danny, please give it to him.” He looked over the little.

“Here.” she gave me a box and chuckled at me, her smile is so sweet. She’s so cute.

“Fraid I might have sat16 on it at some point! I imagine that it’ll taste fine just the same; she helped me bake17 that cake. Words and all. Heh. I did the writing.” The giant man patted her head.

“Go on, Harry, open it.” She grins, I opened the box, it was a cake. It says ‘Happee Birdae Harry.’

“Thank you!”

“It’s not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?”

The man sits down on the couch; he took his umbrella out and pointed it at the empty fire. Two sparks fly out the fire starts – the Dursley gasp.

I put the cake down to the table, “Excuse me, who are you?” I asked. “

“Rubeus Hagrid. The keeper of hey and grounds at Hogwarts also this is Danny, Dumbledore’s granddaughter. Course, you’ll know all about the Hogwarts.” He introduced himself and the little girl with him.

“Sorry, no.”

“No? Blimey, Harry, didn’t you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?”

“Learnt what?” I asked.

“You’re a wizard, Harry.”

“I-I’m a what?”

“A wizard.” She said.

“And a thumping good one at that, I’d wager. Once you train up a little.” He finished her sentence.

“No, you’ve made18 a mistake. I can’t be... a-a wizard. I mean, I’m just... Harry. Just Harry.” I said I saw from the corner of my eyes19; she’s laughing silently.

“Well, Just Harry, did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn’t explain when you were angry or scared?”

My expression softens. “Ah.” He smiles. I heard Dudley whimper from fear.

Hagrid stood up and handed me the same letter that has been sent to the house for a while. I opened it and read it out loud.

“Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts’ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!” I read.

“He’ll not be going!”

“But why not!” Danny said and was about to cry.

“I’m sorry, child, but we swore when we took him in, we’d put an end to this rubbish!” Uncle Vernon’s expression softens when be apologized to her.

“You knew?? You knew all along and never told me?” I turned to Aunt Petunia.

“Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn’t it wonderful? I was the only who to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you’d be just the same, just as strange, just as abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up! And we got landed with you.” She teared a bit.

² Danny’s POV ²

“Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!” Harry yelled at them.

What’s a car crash? Mostly what’s a car? I don’t really read about muggles, all my own books that have has been with since I was a little we’re about witches, wizards, gods, and demons.

“A car crash? A car crash kills James and Lily Potter?” Uncle Hagrid wasn’t pleased why the reason they told Harry.

“We had to tell him something.”

“It’s an outrage! It’s a scandal!”

“He’ll not be going!” The man said.

“Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like your self’s going to stop him, are you?”

I moved towards Harry and stood beside him.

“Muggle?” Harry turned towards me.

“It means, non-magic folk. Like them.” I said.

“This boy’s had his name down ever since he was born! He’s going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he’ll be under the greatest headmaster Hogwarts’ has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.” Uncle Hagrid said, I smiled as soon he mentioned my grandfather20.

“I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!” The man yelled.

My anger rose when he disrespected my grandfather; my grandfather is the best headmaster!21 He’s nice! But a bit mad sometimes, but he’s still the greatest wizard!

Uncle Hagrid whipped out his umbrella and pointed it at Mr. Dursley, “Never insult Albus Dumbledore in front of me, especially at the kid.”

I heard a munching noise, I turned towards, and uncle Hagrid saw the boy eating Harry’s cake, he points his umbrellas at him, but then a grey tail grows.

“Ahh!” Dudley screams, and his family joined, and they chased the boy.

Harry and I laughed, “Oh, um, I’d appreciate it if you didn’t tell anyone at Hogwarts about that22. I was strictly speaking; I’m not allowed to do magic.” Uncle Hagrid whispered to Harry.

Harry nods, “okay.” and smiled. I checked the clock, and we are a bit behind the time, I tapped his arm and showed him my watch.

“Ooh, we’re a bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you instead stay, of course. Hmm?” He left and waited outside.

“Come on, Harry; we will be late.” I linked my arms around his.

He looked at me and then to the family who is panicking because of the tail.

“Let’s go.” I grinned, and both of us left.



We walked around the streets of London, some people were staring at us but mostly at my uncle.

“All students must be equipped23 with... One standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat, or a toad.” He reads the paper and then turned towards my uncle.

“Can we find all this in London?”

“Of course!”

“But if you know where to go.”

We got to a corner store and entered, and it was The Leaky Cauldron. Music and people are talking.

“Ah! Hagrid! The usual, I presume, and it seems like you brought Danny with you, or she ran away again?” Mr. Tom said as the customers laughed.

I blushed from the embarrassment, yes I ran away a lot of times. Since uncle Snape said learning about Muggles are just a waste of time, so I tried to sneak to check the muggle world but end up getting caught.

“No, thanks, Tom. And Danny didn’t run away, both of us are on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.” Uncle Hagrid smiled.

“Bless my soul; it’s Harry Potter.” Mr. Tom said the pub went silent. A man came up to Harry and shook his hand.

“Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.” The man said, then a which comes up and shakes Harry’s hand.

“Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter, I can’t believe I’m meeting you at last.”

Then we saw a man with a turban on his head appears in front of us, and it’s professor Quirrell.

He’s nice, but I don’t like him at all, I always get those bad vibes towards him sometimes. Because I would catch him staring at me, and it’s very creepy.

“Harry P-potter. Can’t tell you how pleased I am to meet you.” Professor Quirrell said.

“Hello, Professor. I didn’t see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He’ll be your and also Danny’s Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.” Uncle Hagrid explained.

“Oh, nice to meet you.” Harry puts his hand out for a shake, but Professor Quirrell refused and stared at his hands.

“F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.”

“Yes, well, we must be going now lots to buy. Heh.”

“Goodbye.”

We left and went to the backroom winery in front of a brick wall.

“See Harry! You’re famous!” I smiled at him.

“But why am I famous? Danny? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am.” Harry said.

“I don’t know, no one told me, but all I know is you’re famous. But maybe uncle Hagrid knows why.” Both of his turned to uncle Hagrid; he looked at us and shook his head.

“I’m not exactly sure I’m the right person to tell you that, Harry.” He said and began to tap the brick wall clockwise with his umbrella. The blocks shifted and opened up to reveal a hidden, busy street.

“Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.”



Đọc lại Ngoại truyện Harry Potter – Hồi 1: Nhân vật bí ẩn

I woke up as soon as the sun hit my face. I groaned and sat down to my bed, “I want to sleep more.” I slammed my body back to my bed, “Danny goes wash up now, and goes to the great hall quick.” I heard aunt Hooch spoke, I looked towards the door, and she was leaning against the doorway.

“Alright, alright.” I stood up and went to the bathroom and did my daily routine, “Why the rush.” I brushed my teeth as more questions come to my mind, thinking what the next prank we’ll be doing today with the twins.

After I’m done with my routine in the bathroom, I changed my nightclothes into a grey dress and headed to the great hall. But I was surprised by the loud noises of party popper and clapping hands, and I looked at everyone confused.

“Grandpapa, what’s going on?” I walked up to my grandfather and stood next to uncle Snape, “Here.” Grandfather gave me a letter, I looked at him in confusion but then it struck me, I hurried looked at the letter, and it was my Hogwarts letter.

“No…” I mumbled as I opened the letter, there were two papers. The first one says

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

Headmaster: Albus Dumbledore

(Order of Merlin, First Class, Grand Sorc., Chf. Warlock, Supreme Mugwump, International Confed. of Wizards)

Dear Ms. Dumbledore,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted1 at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Please find enclosed a list of all necessary books and equipment.

The term begins on 1 September. We await your owl by no later than 31 July.

Yours sincerely,

Minerva McGonagall

Deputy Headmistress

Then I looked at the other paper, and it says all the things I’ll be needing as the first year.

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

UNIFORM

First-year students will require:

1. Three sets of plain work robes (black)

2. One plain pointed hat (black) for day wear

3. One pair of protective gloves (dragon hide or similar)

4. One winter cloak (black, with silver fastenings)

Please note that all pupil’s clothes should carry name tags.

COURSE BOOKS

All students should have a copy of each of the following:

The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1) by Miranda Goshawk

A History of Magic by Bathilda Bagshot

Magical Theory by Adalbert Waffling

A Beginner’s Guide to Transfiguration by Emeric Switch

One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi by Phyllida Spore

Magical Drafts and Potions by Arsenius Jiager

Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them by Newt Scamander

The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self-Protection by Quentin Trimble

OTHER EQUIPMENT

1 wand

1 cauldron (pewter, standard size 2)

1 set glass or crystal phials

1 telescope

1 set brass scales

Students may also bring if they desire an owl OR a cat OR a toad.

PARENTS ARE REMINDED THAT FIRST YEARS ARE NOT ALLOWED THEIR OWN BROOMSTICK

Yours sincerely,

Lucinda Thomsonicle-Pocus

Chief Attendant of Witchcraft Provisions

I stared at them with widened eyes, and then to all students. They all smiled at me.

“I, I got my letter.” I started crying, as all the staff congratulated me and gave me a warm hug.

I ran to my friends as they all hugged me. I ran to the twins and showed them my letter.

“Congratulations, Danny!” Fred hugged me.

“I hope you get in Gryffindor.” George pinched my cheeks.

“It doesn’t matter which house you go to Danny, but I hope you do go to Gryffindor,” Percy said as Oliver nodded and smiled at me.

“He’s right, we do hope you get in Gryffindor, but for me, it doesn’t matter.” Oliver ruffled my hair.

“Thanks!” I grinned at them.



“Danny.” My grandfather called out for me; I excused myself from my Hufflepuff friends and went to him.

“What is it, grandpapa?” I smiled, “I wish you to go with Hagrid to fetch someone.” He said.

“Oh, that okay. But when grandpapa?” I asked one more time. “Now.” Uncle Hagrid came out of nowhere.

“Now? Isn’t it a bit late?” “We’ll have to fetch this kid; I’m sure you’ll have fun.”

“Alright, then.” I shrug.



Both uncle Hagrid and I went to the muggle world; it was fascinating.

“We’re here.” The house was in a rock in the ocean. I have no idea why we are here, but I’m sure it will be fun.

Uncle Hagrid kicked the door down and left a big dud as thunder came. People were people screamed in fear.

“Sorry ‘bout that.” Uncle Hagrid said as he fixed the door back where it belongs.

“I demand that you leave at once, Sir! You’re breaking and entering!” The old fat man said as he held a gun towards us.



² Harry’s POV ²

There are a giant man and a little girl who seems a similar age to me. But she’s a bit small.

The giant man walked towards uncle Vernon and grabs the gun and bends it upwards.

“Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.” He said as the gun fires.

“Ah!!” Aunt Petunia and Dudley gasp, as the little girl covered her ears.

“Uncle, that wasn’t nice!” She still covering her ears from the shot.

“Sorry about that, Danny.” He chuckled. But then he spotted Dudley and walked a bit closer to him.

“Mind, I haven’t seen you since you were a baby, Harry, but you’re a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly ‘round the middle.” He rubs his stomach.

“I-I’m not Harry,” Dudley said in fear.

“Hahaha! Silly uncle! He’s over there.” The little girl giggled and pointed at me.

“Where?”

“I-l am.” I moved from my hiding place.

“Oh, well, of course, you are! Got something for you, Danny, please give it to him.” He looked over the little.

“Here.” she gave me a box and chuckled at me, her smile is so sweet. She’s so cute.

“Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it’ll taste fine just the same; she helped me bake that cake. Words and all. Heh. I did the writing.” The giant man patted her head.

“Go on, Harry, open it.” She grins, I opened the box, it was a cake. It says ‘Happee Birdae Harry.’

“Thank you!”

“It’s not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?”

The man sits down on the couch; he took his umbrella out and pointed it at the empty fire. Two sparks fly out the fire starts – the Dursley gasp.

I put the cake down to the table, “Excuse me, who are you?” I asked. “

“Rubeus Hagrid. The keeper of hey and grounds at Hogwarts also this is Danny, Dumbledore’s granddaughter. Course, you’ll know all about the Hogwarts.” He introduced himself and the little girl with him.

“Sorry, no.”

“No? Blimey, Harry, didn’t you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?”

“Learnt what?” I asked.

“You’re a wizard, Harry.”

“I-I’m a what?”

“A wizard.” She said.

“And a thumping good one at that, I’d wager. Once you train up a little.” He finished her sentence.

“No, you’ve made a mistake. I can’t be... a-a wizard. I mean, I’m just... Harry. Just Harry.” I said I saw from the corner of my eyes; she’s laughing silently.

“Well, Just Harry, did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn’t explain when you were angry or scared?”

My expression softens. “Ah.” He smiles. I heard Dudley whimper from fear.

Hagrid stood up and handed me the same letter that has been sent to the house for a while. I opened it and read it out loud.

“Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts’ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!” I read.

“He’ll not be going!”

“But why not!” Danny said and was about to cry.

“I’m sorry, child, but we swore when we took him in, we’d put an end to this rubbish!” Uncle Vernon’s expression softens when be apologized to her.

“You knew?? You knew all along and never told me?” I turned to Aunt Petunia.

“Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn’t it wonderful? I was the only who to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you’d be just the same, just as strange, just as abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up! And we got landed with you.” She teared a bit.

² Danny’s POV ²

“Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!” Harry yelled at them.

What’s a car crash? Mostly what’s a car? I don’t really read about muggles, all my own books that have has been with since I was a little we’re about witches, wizards, gods, and demons.

“A car crash? A car crash kills James and Lily Potter?” Uncle Hagrid wasn’t pleased why the reason they told Harry.

“We had to tell him something.”

“It’s an outrage! It’s a scandal!”

“He’ll not be going!” The man said.

“Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like your self’s going to stop him, are you?”

I moved towards Harry and stood beside him.

“Muggle?” Harry turned towards me.

“It means, non-magic folk. Like them.” I said.

“This boy’s had his name down ever since he was born! He’s going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he’ll be under the greatest headmaster Hogwarts’ has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.” Uncle Hagrid said, I smiled as soon he mentioned my grandfather.

“I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!” The man yelled.

My anger rose when he disrespected my grandfather; my grandfather is the best headmaster! He’s nice! But a bit mad sometimes, but he’s still the greatest wizard!

Uncle Hagrid whipped out his umbrella and pointed it at Mr. Dursley, “Never insult Albus Dumbledore in front of me, especially at the kid.”

I heard a munching noise, I turned towards, and uncle Hagrid saw the boy eating Harry’s cake, he points his umbrellas at him, but then a grey tail grows.

“Ahh!” Dudley screams, and his family joined, and they chased the boy.

Harry and I laughed, “Oh, um, I’d appreciate it if you didn’t tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. I was strictly speaking; I’m not allowed to do magic.” Uncle Hagrid whispered to Harry.

Harry nods, “okay.” and smiled. I checked the clock, and we are a bit behind the time, I tapped his arm and showed him my watch.

“Ooh, we’re a bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you instead stay, of course. Hmm?” He left and waited outside.

“Come on, Harry; we will be late.” I linked my arms around his.

He looked at me and then to the family who is panicking because of the tail.

“Let’s go.” I grinned, and both of us left.



We walked around the streets of London, some people were staring at us but mostly at my uncle.

“All students must be equipped with... One standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat, or a toad.” He reads the paper and then turned towards my uncle.

“Can we find all this in London?”

“Of course!”

“But if you know where to go.”

We got to a corner store and entered, and it was The Leaky Cauldron. Music and people are talking.

“Ah! Hagrid! The usual, I presume, and it seems like you brought Danny with you, or she ran away again?” Mr. Tom said as the customers laughed.

I blushed from the embarrassment, yes I ran away a lot of times. Since uncle Snape said learning about Muggles are just a waste of time, so I tried to sneak to check the muggle world but end up getting caught.

“No, thanks, Tom. And Danny didn’t run away, both of us are on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.” Uncle Hagrid smiled.

“Bless my soul; it’s Harry Potter.” Mr. Tom said the pub went silent. A man came up to Harry and shook his hand.

“Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.” The man said, then a which comes up and shakes Harry’s hand.

“Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter, I can’t believe I’m meeting you at last.”

Then we saw a man with a turban on his head appears in front of us, and it’s professor Quirrell.

He’s nice, but I don’t like him at all, I always get those bad vibes towards him sometimes. Because I would catch him staring at me, and it’s very creepy.

“Harry P-potter. Can’t tell you how pleased I am to meet you.” Professor Quirrell said.

“Hello, Professor. I didn’t see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He’ll be your and also Danny’s Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.” Uncle Hagrid explained.

“Oh, nice to meet you.” Harry puts his hand out for a shake, but Professor Quirrell refused and stared at his hands.

“F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.”

“Yes, well, we must be going now lots to buy. Heh.”

“Goodbye.”

We left and went to the backroom winery in front of a brick wall.

“See Harry! You’re famous!” I smiled at him.

“But why am I famous? Danny? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am.” Harry said.

“I don’t know, no one told me, but all I know is you’re famous. But maybe uncle Hagrid knows why.” Both of his turned to uncle Hagrid; he looked at us and shook his head.

“I’m not exactly sure I’m the right person to tell you that, Harry.” He said and began to tap the brick wall clockwise with his umbrella. The blocks shifted and opened up to reveal a hidden, busy street.

“Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.”



To be continue…

Chào mừng mọi người đến với một series bài học tiếng Anh do chính đội ngũ StudyCare Education sản xuất – Học Tiếng Anh cùng ngoại truyện Harry Potter. Chắc hẳn các bạn học sinh đã không còn xa lạ gì với bộ tiểu thuyết huyền thoại này rồi nhỉ? Nếu vậy hãy cùng chúng tớ du hành ngay đến xứ sở phép thuật nhiệm màu với phiên bản ngoại truyện “Hidden||Harry Potter various [YEAR 1-2]” và thông qua đó trau dồi thêm vốn tiếng Anh của mình nha!

Hôm đó là một ngày đặc biệt, Danny đã chính thức được nhận lá thư nhập học trường Hogwarts từ ông mình – Thầy hiệu trưởng Dumbledore. Ngay sau đó, cô được giao nhiệm vụ đồng hành cùng bác Hagrid, cả hai sẽ lên đường để đón “cậu bé được chọn” Harry Potter. Vậy hành trình của cô bé Danny sẽ diễn ra như thế nào? Danny gặp gỡ Harry Potter ra sao? Mời các bạn hãy cùng theo dõi – Hồi 1: Nhân vật bí ẩn.

TẢI BẢN ĐỌC PDF

Tôi bừng tỉnh khi những tia nắng ban mai bắt đầu rọi lên gương mặt mình. Tôi bật dậy trên giường, cất giọng lè nhè: “Mình muốn ngủ thêm nữa!”, rồi lại ngã người xuống đống chăn ấm nệm êm.

“Danny dậy, tắm rửa sạch sẽ rồi ra đại sảnh đường nhanh.” Dì Hooch nói.

Tôi nhìn về phía trước và thấy dì đang đứng tựa vào cánh cửa.

“Rồi, rồi.”

Tôi đứng dậy đi vào phòng tắm, làm những công việc thường ngày của mình, nghĩ thầm: “Làm gì mà gấp dữ vậy!”

Trong lúc tôi đánh răng, những câu hỏi lại dần nảy lên trong tâm trí, nghĩ xem trò chơi khăm tiếp theo mà chúng tôi sẽ làm với cặp song sinh hôm nay là gì.

Sau khi tắm xong, tôi thay đồ ngủ và bận một chiếc váy dài màu xám đi đến đại sảnh đường. Nhưng rồi tôi bị bất ngờ bởi tiếng pháo nổ và những tràn vỗ tay. Tôi bối rối nhìn quanh.

“Ông nội, chuyện gì đang diễn ra vậy?” Tôi đi đến chỗ ông và đứng cạnh chú Snape.

“Đây.”

Ông nội đưa cho tôi một bức thư, tôi nhìn ông một cách bối rối nhưng rồi ngỡ ngàng đến xúc động. Tôi vội vàng nhìn vào bức thư, và đó chính là bức thư nhập học trường Hogwarts của mình.

“Không…” Tôi vừa lầm bầm vừa mở lá thư ra, trong đó có hai tờ giấy. Tờ đầu viết

HỌC VIỆN PHÁP THUẬT VÀ MA THUẬT HOGWARTS

Hiệu trưởng: Albus Dumbledore

(Huân chương Merlin đệ nhất đẳng, Đại phù thủy, Tổng Warlock, Trọng nhân tối cao, Liên đoàn Phù thủy Quốc tế)

Cô Dumbledore thân mến,

Chúng tôi hân hạnh thông báo cho cô rằng cô đã trúng tuyển vào Học viện Pháp thuật và Ma thuật Hogwarts. Xin vui lòng xem danh sách đính kèm về toàn bộ sách và trang thiết bị cần thiết.

Khóa học bắt đầu vào ngày 1 tháng 9.

Chúng tôi đợi cú của cô chậm nhất là ngày 31 tháng 7.

Kính thư,

Minerva McGonagall

Phó Hiệu trưởng

Sau đó, tôi nhìn vào tờ giấy kia, và nó cho biết tất cả những thứ tôi sẽ cần trong năm học đầu tiên tại trường.

HỌC VIỆN PHÁP THUẬT VÀ MA THUẬT HOGWARTS

ĐỒNG PHỤC

Học sinh năm thứ nhất cần:

1. Ba bộ áo chùng thực tập (màu đen)

2. Một nón đỉnh nhọn (đen) mặc ban ngày

3. Một bộ găng tay bảo hộ (bằng da rồng hay tương tự)

4. Một áo choàng mùa đông (đen, thắt lưng bạc)

Lưu ý là đồng phục của tất cả học sinh đều mang phù hiệu và tên.

SÁCH GIÁO KHOA

Tất cả học sinh đều phải có các sách liệt kê sau đây:

Sách Thần chú căn bản (Lớp 1) của Miranda Goshawk

Lịch sử pháp thuật của Bathilda Bagshot

Lý thuyết pháp thuật của Adalbert Waffling

Hướng dẫn biến hình dành cho người nhập môn của Emeric Switch

Một ngàn thảo dược và nấm mốc ma thuật của Phyllida Spore

Đề cương phép lạ và độc dược của Arsenius Jiager

Sinh vật huyền bí và nơi tìm ra chúng của Newt Scamander

Những lực lượng hắc ám: Hướng dẫn tự vệ của Quentin Trimble

TRANG THIẾT BỊ KHÁC

1 cây đũa phép

1 cái vạc (bằng thiếc, cỡ số 2)

1 bộ chai lọ ống nghiệm thủy tinh

1 kính viễn vọng

1 bộ cân bằng đồng

Học sinh cũng có thể đem theo một con cú HOẶC một con mèo HOẶC một con cóc.

LƯU Ý PHỤ HUYNH LÀ HỌC SINH NĂM THỨ NHẤT KHÔNG ĐƯỢC PHÉP CÓ CÁN CHỔI RIÊNG

Kính thư,

Lucinda Thomsonicle-Pocus

“Ta không chắc mình là người thích hợp để nói với con điều đó, Harry.” Bác ấy nói và bắt đầu dùng ô gõ nhẹ vào bức tường gạch theo chiều kim đồng hồ.

“Ba dọc… hai ngang… Hai đứa bây lùi lại nào.”

Các khối gạch bắt đầu chuyển động và mở ra một cánh cổng lớn, để lộ ra con phố bí mật, đông đúc và nhộn nhịp ở phía sau.

“Chào mừng con đến Hẻm Xéo, Harry.” Bác Hagrid nhe răng cười.

Ngay sau đó, cô được giao nhiệm vụ đồng hành cùng bác Hagrid, cả hai sẽ lên đường để đón “cậu bé được chọn” Harry Potter. Vậy hành trình của cô bé Danny sẽ diễn ra như thế nào? TẢI BẢN ĐỌC PDF

I woke up as soon as the sun hit my face. I groaned and sat down to my bed, “I want to sleep more.” I slammed my body back to my bed, “Danny goes wash up now, and goes to the great hall quick.” I heard aunt Hooch spoke, I looked towards the door, and she was leaning against the doorway.

“Alright, alright.” I stood up and went to the bathroom and did my daily routine, “Why the rush.” I brushed my teeth as more questions come to my mind, thinking what the next prank we’ll be doing today with the twins.

After I’m done with my routine in the bathroom, I changed my nightclothes into a grey dress and headed to the great hall. But I was surprised by the loud noises of party popper and clapping hands, and I looked at everyone confused.

“Grandpapa, what’s going on?” I walked up to my grandfather and stood next to uncle Snape, “Here.” Grandfather gave me a letter, I looked at him in confusion but then it struck me, I hurried looked at the letter, and it was my Hogwarts letter.

“No…” I mumbled as I opened the letter, there were two papers. The first one says

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

Headmaster: Albus Dumbledore

(Order of Merlin, First Class, Grand Sorc., Chf. Warlock, Supreme Mugwump, International Confed. of Wizards)

Dear Ms. Dumbledore,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Please find enclosed a list of all necessary books and equipment.

The term begins on 1 September. We await your owl by no later than 31 July.

Yours sincerely,

Minerva McGonagall

Deputy Headmistress

Then I looked at the other paper, and it says all the things I’ll be needing as the first year.

HOGWARTS SCHOOL of WITCHCRAFT and WIZARDRY

UNIFORM

First-year students will require:

1. Three sets of plain work robes (black)

2. One plain pointed hat (black) for day wear

3. One pair of protective gloves (dragon hide or similar)

4. One winter cloak (black, with silver fastenings)

Please note that all pupil’s clothes should carry name tags.

COURSE BOOKS

All students should have a copy of each of the following:

The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1) by Miranda Goshawk

A History of Magic by Bathilda Bagshot

Magical Theory by Adalbert Waffling

A Beginner’s Guide to Transfiguration by Emeric Switch

One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi by Phyllida Spore

Magical Drafts and Potions by Arsenius Jiager

Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them by Newt Scamander

The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self-Protection by Quentin Trimble

OTHER EQUIPMENT

1 wand

1 cauldron (pewter, standard size 2)

1 set glass or crystal phials

1 telescope

1 set brass scales

Students may also bring if they desire an owl OR a cat OR a toad.

PARENTS ARE REMINDED THAT FIRST YEARS ARE NOT ALLOWED THEIR OWN BROOMSTICK

Yours sincerely,

Lucinda Thomsonicle-Pocus

Chief Attendant of Witchcraft Provisions

I stared at them with widened eyes, and then to all students. They all smiled at me.

“I, I got my letter.” I started crying, as all the staff congratulated me and gave me a warm hug.

I ran to my friends as they all hugged me. I ran to the twins and showed them my letter.

“Congratulations, Danny!” Fred hugged me.

“I hope you get in Gryffindor.” George pinched my cheeks.

“It doesn’t matter which house you go to Danny, but I hope you do go to Gryffindor,” Percy said as Oliver nodded and smiled at me.

“He’s right, we do hope you get in Gryffindor, but for me, it doesn’t matter.” Oliver ruffled my hair.

“Thanks!” I grinned at them.



“Danny.” My grandfather called out for me; I excused myself from my Hufflepuff friends and went to him.

“What is it, grandpapa?” I smiled, “I wish you to go with Hagrid to fetch someone.” He said.

“Oh, that okay. But when grandpapa?” I asked one more time. “Now.” Uncle Hagrid came out of nowhere.

“Now? Isn’t it a bit late?” “We’ll have to fetch this kid; I’m sure you’ll have fun.”

“Alright, then.” I shrug.



Both uncle Hagrid and I went to the muggle world; it was fascinating.

“We’re here.” The house was in a rock in the ocean. I have no idea why we are here, but I’m sure it will be fun.

Uncle Hagrid kicked the door down and left a big dud as thunder came. People were people screamed in fear.

“Sorry ‘bout that.” Uncle Hagrid said as he fixed the door back where it belongs.

“I demand that you leave at once, Sir! You’re breaking and entering!” The old fat man said as he held a gun towards us.



² Harry’s POV ²

There are a giant man and a little girl who seems a similar age to me. But she’s a bit small.

The giant man walked towards uncle Vernon and grabs the gun and bends it upwards.

“Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.” He said as the gun fires.

“Ah!!” Aunt Petunia and Dudley gasp, as the little girl covered her ears.

“Uncle, that wasn’t nice!” She still covering her ears from the shot.

“Sorry about that, Danny.” He chuckled. But then he spotted Dudley and walked a bit closer to him.

“Mind, I haven’t seen you since you were a baby, Harry, but you’re a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly ‘round the middle.” He rubs his stomach.

“I-I’m not Harry,” Dudley said in fear.

“Hahaha! Silly uncle! He’s over there.” The little girl giggled and pointed at me.

“Where?”

“I-l am.” I moved from my hiding place.

“Oh, well, of course, you are! Got something for you, Danny, please give it to him.” He looked over the little.

“Here.” she gave me a box and chuckled at me, her smile is so sweet. She’s so cute.

“Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it’ll taste fine just the same; she helped me bake that cake. Words and all. Heh. I did the writing.” The giant man patted her head.

“Go on, Harry, open it.” She grins, I opened the box, it was a cake. It says ‘Happee Birdae Harry.’

“Thank you!”

“It’s not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?”

The man sits down on the couch; he took his umbrella out and pointed it at the empty fire. Two sparks fly out the fire starts – the Dursley gasp.

I put the cake down to the table, “Excuse me, who are you?” I asked. “

“Rubeus Hagrid. The keeper of hey and grounds at Hogwarts also this is Danny, Dumbledore’s granddaughter. Course, you’ll know all about the Hogwarts.” He introduced himself and the little girl with him.

“Sorry, no.”

“No? Blimey, Harry, didn’t you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?”

“Learnt what?” I asked.

“You’re a wizard, Harry.”

“I-I’m a what?”

“A wizard.” She said.

“And a thumping good one at that, I’d wager. Once you train up a little.” He finished her sentence.

“No, you’ve made a mistake. I can’t be… a-a wizard. I mean, I’m just… Harry. Just Harry.” I said I saw from the corner of my eyes; she’s laughing silently.

“Well, Just Harry, did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn’t explain when you were angry or scared?”

My expression softens. “Ah.” He smiles. I heard Dudley whimper from fear.

Hagrid stood up and handed me the same letter that has been sent to the house for a while. I opened it and read it out loud.

“Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts’ School of Witchcraft and Wizardry!” I read.

“He’ll not be going!”

“But why not!” Danny said and was about to cry.

“I’m sorry, child, but we swore when we took him in, we’d put an end to this rubbish!” Uncle Vernon’s expression softens when be apologized to her.

“You knew?? You knew all along and never told me?” I turned to Aunt Petunia.

“Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn’t it wonderful? I was the only who to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you’d be just the same, just as strange, just as abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up! And we got landed with you.” She teared a bit.

² Danny’s POV ²

“Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!” Harry yelled at them.

What’s a car crash? Mostly what’s a car? I don’t really read about muggles, all my own books that have has been with since I was a little we’re about witches, wizards, gods, and demons.

“A car crash? A car crash kills James and Lily Potter?” Uncle Hagrid wasn’t pleased why the reason they told Harry.

“We had to tell him something.”

“It’s an outrage! It’s a scandal!”

“He’ll not be going!” The man said.

“Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like your self’s going to stop him, are you?”

I moved towards Harry and stood beside him.

“Muggle?” Harry turned towards me.

“It means, non-magic folk. Like them.” I said.

“This boy’s had his name down ever since he was born! He’s going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he’ll be under the greatest headmaster Hogwarts’ has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.” Uncle Hagrid said, I smiled as soon he mentioned my grandfather.

“I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!” The man yelled.

My anger rose when he disrespected my grandfather; my grandfather is the best headmaster! He’s nice! But a bit mad sometimes, but he’s still the greatest wizard!

Uncle Hagrid whipped out his umbrella and pointed it at Mr. Dursley, “Never insult Albus Dumbledore in front of me, especially at the kid.”

I heard a munching noise, I turned towards, and uncle Hagrid saw the boy eating Harry’s cake, he points his umbrellas at him, but then a grey tail grows.

“Ahh!” Dudley screams, and his family joined, and they chased the boy.

Harry and I laughed, “Oh, um, I’d appreciate it if you didn’t tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. I was strictly speaking; I’m not allowed to do magic.” Uncle Hagrid whispered to Harry.

Harry nods, “okay.” and smiled. I checked the clock, and we are a bit behind the time, I tapped his arm and showed him my watch.

“Ooh, we’re a bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you instead stay, of course. Hmm?” He left and waited outside.

“Come on, Harry; we will be late.” I linked my arms around his.

He looked at me and then to the family who is panicking because of the tail.

“Let’s go.” I grinned, and both of us left.



We walked around the streets of London, some people were staring at us but mostly at my uncle.

“All students must be equipped with… One standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat, or a toad.” He reads the paper and then turned towards my uncle.

“Can we find all this in London?”

“Of course!”

“But if you know where to go.”

We got to a corner store and entered, and it was The Leaky Cauldron. Music and people are talking.

“Ah! Hagrid! The usual, I presume, and it seems like you brought Danny with you, or she ran away again?” Mr. Tom said as the customers laughed.

I blushed from the embarrassment, yes I ran away a lot of times. Since uncle Snape said learning about Muggles are just a waste of time, so I tried to sneak to check the muggle world but end up getting caught.

“No, thanks, Tom. And Danny didn’t run away, both of us are on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.” Uncle Hagrid smiled.

“Bless my soul; it’s Harry Potter.” Mr. Tom said the pub went silent. A man came up to Harry and shook his hand.

“Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.” The man said, then a which comes up and shakes Harry’s hand.

“Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter, I can’t believe I’m meeting you at last.”

Then we saw a man with a turban on his head appears in front of us, and it’s professor Quirrell.

He’s nice, but I don’t like him at all, I always get those bad vibes towards him sometimes. Because I would catch him staring at me, and it’s very creepy.

“Harry P-potter. Can’t tell you how pleased I am to meet you.” Professor Quirrell said.

“Hello, Professor. I didn’t see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He’ll be your and also Danny’s Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.” Uncle Hagrid explained.

“Oh, nice to meet you.” Harry puts his hand out for a shake, but Professor Quirrell refused and stared at his hands.

“F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.”

“Yes, well, we must be going now lots to buy. Heh.”

“Goodbye.”

We left and went to the backroom winery in front of a brick wall.

“See Harry! You’re famous!” I smiled at him.

“But why am I famous? Danny? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am.” Harry said.

“I don’t know, no one told me, but all I know is you’re famous. But maybe uncle Hagrid knows why.” Both of his turned to uncle Hagrid; he looked at us and shook his head.

“I’m not exactly sure I’m the right person to tell you that, Harry.” He said and began to tap the brick wall clockwise with his umbrella. The blocks shifted and opened up to reveal a hidden, busy street.

“Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.”


